alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 03 at 2:21AM PDT until April 03 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches...with locations near mountain bases receive up to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...White Pine County. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 6 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
